EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.7-14-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Rob Mee on Business Insider's Top 100, Coding Camps, and Encrypting Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 14, 2016 <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/the-silicon-valley-100-ranked-1-to-100-2016-6]]> Rob Mee is on Business Insider’s Top 100 of Silicon Valley Pivotal CEO Rob Mee has been listed by Business Insider as one of the most influential leaders in Silicon Valley. Read Now <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/the-silicon-valley-100-ranked-1-to-100-2016-6]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/net-and-beyond-12-factors-with-kevin-hoffman]]> .NET and Beyond 12 Factors with Kevin Hoffman Coté and Kevin Hoffman discuss the .NET world, Steel Toe, and Kevin’s book “Beyond the Twelve-Factor App” in the latest episode of the Pivotal Podcast. Listen In <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/net-and-beyond-12-factors-with-kevin-hoffman]]> <[[http://www.mercurynews.com/ci_30112181/coding-camps]]> Coding Camps Help Bridge Gender Gap in the Tech Industry Cornelia Davis explains to The Mercury News why it is important to support young women in coding. Check It Out <[[http://www.mercurynews.com/ci_30112181/coding-camps]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/products/encrypting-data-at-rest-and-in-motion-for-pivotal-greenplum-zettaset]]> Encrypting Data-at-Rest and in-Motion for Pivotal Greenplum & Zettaset Learn how Zettaset BDEncrypt is integrated with Pivotal Greenplum DB to help achieve corporate and regulatory data protection requirements such as HIPAA, HITECH, and PCI. Learn More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/products/encrypting-data-at-rest-and-in-motion-for-pivotal-greenplum-zettaset]]> Upcoming Events 7/12 Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow, Stuttgart <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/stuttgart]]>
